{{ getProduct().name }}

Цена: {{ getProduct().price }}

Размеры: {{ size }}

Description

{{ getProduct().description }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../../../models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-page', templateUrl: './product-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-page.component.css'] }) export class ProductPageComponent implements OnInit { private product: Product = { id: "123", name: "Рубаха", size: [48, 50, 52], price: 1500, category: "Хлопок", description: "Самая шикарная рубаха", mainImage: "https://uxawscdn.baozun.com/aws/96001096/20230509/D43D0D68AA67502BBE968D5E63DB6EB5_1.png?x-oss-process=image/resize,m_fill,h_492,w_392", listImage: [ "https://uxawscdn.baozun.com/aws/96001096/20210825/9B8F088396634782A750BD352CC4A158.png?x-oss-process=image/quality,q_80/format,webp/resize,m_fill,h_649,w_464", "https://uxawscdn.baozun.com/aws/96001096/20210825/D94CD379EBD0B64D75C6BBC6073690C0_1.png?x-oss-process=image/quality,q_80/format,webp/resize,m_fill,h_649,w_464" ] }; constructor() { // получение id из строки } ngOnInit(): void { } public getProduct(): Product { return this.product; } public setProduct(product: Product) { this.product = product; } }
